name: Watermelon, Feta and Spinach Salad
description: Crisp, juicy watermelon paired with creamy, salty feta is a well-known winning combination. What makes this salad better is the hint of lemon & dill, and the delicious tang from the Greek dressing. A delicious ode to summer’s most popular fruit!

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or Creamy Potato Salad Dressing Mix
Greek Dressing or  Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing

preparation: Toss feta with Lemon Dilly Dip Mix.
In a large bowl, toss watermelon with cucumber, onion, olives, Sea Salt and Pepper. Add spinach and radicchio.
Drizzle with prepared Dressing and toss to mix.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.

products.name: Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing Mix
summary: Fresh, bright & bold blend of Mediterranean herbs with notes of garlic & rosemary. Our most versatile dressing.
